title: China reports second-quarter GDP growth of 4.7%, missing expectations
content: The National Bureau of Statistics did not hold a press conference for the data release. China's high-level policy meeting, the Third Plenum, kicks off Monday.
summary: The National Bureau of Statistics did not hold a press conference for the data release. China's high-level policy meeting, the Third Plenum, kicks off Monday.

title: China's beer market, the world's largest, set for bounce as drinkers go high-end
content: CGS International expects a recovery in beer consumption in the latter part of the year following a likely decline in volumes in the first half compared to 2023.

title: World leaders condemn assassination attempt on Trump: 'Tragedy for democracy'

title: Asia markets mostly slip as investors assess China GDP miss and assassination attempt on Trump

title: China gears up for its Third Plenum meeting. Here's why real estate isn't likely the main focus
